title: Topic 001 Question 249
body: A company has a critical serverless application that uses multiple AWS Lambda functions. Each Lambda function generates 1 GB of log data daily in its own Amazon CloudWatch Logs log group. The company's security team asks for a count of application errors, grouped by type, across all of the log groups.
What should a SysOps administrator do to meet this requirement?
options: Perform a CloudWatch Logs Insights query that uses the stats command and count function.
Perform a CloudWatch Logs search that uses the groupby keyword and count function.
Perform an Amazon Athena query that uses the SELECT and GROUP BY keywords.
Perform an Amazon RDS query that uses the SELECT and GROUP BY keywords.
